{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Gem Plates |image = [[File:Mine_Draco_Plate.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Draco Plate''. |price = |location = [[Underground]] [[Berry Master]] }} ==Description== '''Gem Plates''' are 4x3 square big items you can mine from the [[Underground]], obtain from Daily Deals, or trade for with the Hoenn [[Berry Master]]. They can then either be sold for 100 [[Gems]] of their respective type, or traded for other items in Daily Deals. ===Types=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" ! Plate Name
